Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

The skies seem to darken as the sweeps rise into the air as a single flowing mass, even as the last weapons fire rips into the skies, then there�s silence! The plague that is the unicronian sweeps appears, at least for the moment, to be halted!
   
  At the water�s edge Cyclonus looks down at Rodimus even as he is forced to spin and dodge the incoming laser fire. He managed to catch Kup�s laser blasts with his hands, again absorbing the energies into his systems, only to be have rockets streak at him from Rodimus Prime�s attack! A last minute detonation of them with his pulse cannon explodes them in the air in front of him, yet the force of it still blows him backward and slamming him into the wall. Anger curls itself around Cyclonus� face, and he is a fraction of a second from returning the attack when he hears Rodimus� stand down order and the city goes quiet. 
   
  Scourge arrives in the skies behind Cyclonus and transforms. Noting his commander condition he powers up his cannons ready to rip into anything that moves against them. Cyclonus� silence is thoughtful and grim as he looked down at Rodimus, for the moment ignoring Remus. His only movement is only a slight gesture to Scourge as he comes in behind him to forestall any attacks on the Maximals or Autobots present. 
   
  Finally Cyclonus nodded to Rodimus as he and Scourge fly out over the sea and towards their place of meeting, Cyclonus� face is thoughtful, the powerful glow of his optics dimming somewhat as the damage to Cyclonus armor glows and knits. 
   
  Scourge though does not take all of this with the equamity of Cyclonus, he eyes Remus, �Rodimus Prime!� the sweep commander�s voice is as it was in former days, but like Cyclonus there is something more in it. �Your soldier is out of place. Remove him, or we will!�
   
  Behind the duo the sweeps swing in, a swarm of hunter-terminators, ready to perform their function to the utmost, and yet for the moment quiescent.
   
  Preston
  (Da'minion)

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
